descriptions.polaris-landing-freemium: Polaris is completely free! From the actual bot across hosting right up to the dashboard! Nothing is paywall locked and is accessible to anyone!
descriptions.polaris-landing-open-source: Polaris is completely open source, meaning anyone can browse through and use our code. This pretty much guarantees that you are being offered a genuine, secure and privacy focused experience.
descriptions.polaris-landing-accessible: Didn't find what you were looking for in Polaris? No problem! You can request it be made, or make it directly yourself! Due to the FOSS nature of Polaris we allow developers to make their own modules to be officially integrated into Polaris for anyone to use!
descriptions.polaris-landing-web-dashboard: Polaris offers a full scale web dashboard for you to manage your servers in. This dashboard allows you to control everything inside your server and modules.
descriptions.polaris-landing-ease-of-use: Polaris is very easy to use. So easy actually, that you can set it up using your phone, and just discord. The web dashboard is an optional management panel for pc users, but the bot can be fully set up and managed from your mobile device.
descriptions.polaris-landing-professional-execution: Polaris was made with everything in mind, including 60+ commands, 20+ individual events that can be setup. This massive suite of features is ready to be used at your will for free, easily and quickly.
descriptions.landing-polaris: Elevate your Discord experience with weekly updates, an intuitive web dashboard, comprehensive documentation, and a commitment to reliability. Join our public test beta, and be a part of shaping the future of this dynamic Discord bot!
descriptions.landing-polarmc: Come join us in a journey of creating a welcoming minecraft community and take part in creating a dynamic world full of beautiful builds and gorgeous custom landscapes!
descriptions.landing-gdk: A comprehensive toolkit designed for developers and designers. It offers a wide array of resources, including extensive color palettes, versatile generators and more!
